title: 96/93/EC: Commission Decision of 12 January 1996 authorizing Sweden to maintain its national measures as regards turkey rhinotracheitis in application of Article 14 (4) of Council Directive 90/539/EEC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 January 1996 authorizing Sweden to maintain its national measures as regards turkey rhinotracheitis in application of Article 14 (4) of Council Directive 90/539/EEC (Text with EEA relevance) (96/93/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Sweden is authorized to maintain its national measures relating to turkey rhinotracheitis until 31 December 1996.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 January 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 303, 31. 10. 1990, p. 6.
